_header: Lord that is of mights most

CamGon175.First Lines:
Lord þat is off myȝtys mostffadyr & sone & holy
                    gost…
CamGon175.Last Lines:
…Leue neuere traytour haue betere endyngBut wyth dome for to
                    dye
